profile.name: Aninda Dhar
profile.summary: Salutations! I am a software consultant at Chamonix IT based in Adelaide, South Australia.
profile.getStarted: Here's some quick links to get started:

aboutMe.heading: About me
aboutMe.background: Enthusiastic computer science graduate with extensive hands-on experience in immersive software development, excelling in both Web & Mobile development complemented by expertise in AI. Originating from a gaming passion, my journey unfolded through the realms of Software, IT, and cybersecurity. I've actively spearheaded innovative solutions catering to diverse industries like education, entertainment, and health, leveraging cutting-edge software. My diverse background sharpens my ability to navigate complexity, foster collaboration, and consistently deliver high-impact solutions in dynamic software ecosystems.

details.1: Contributed significantly to the development and quality enhancement of Angular projects in the health & education industry, achieving significant improvements in functionality, user experience, and system efficiency through diligent code refactoring and comprehensive unit testing.
details.2: Led the strategic migration of Human resources portal, effectively enhancing team productivity and collaboration by meticulously planning and executing data migration with a keen focus on maintaining data integrity and security.
details.3: Successfully met stringent deadlines, delivering top-tier solutions, prioritising seamless functionality and superior user experiences.
details.4: Conducted meticulous and comprehensive unit testing, guaranteeing robust application performance and reliability.
details.5: Orchestrated the strategic migration of a human resources management system to Microsoft Planner, optimising productivity and fostering collaborative workflows.
details.6: Ensured stringent adherence to quality, security, and performance standards throughout projects, collaborating closely with product owners.
details.7: Utilised Azure AI Studio for preliminary data analysis and Azure DevOps Wikis for thorough documentation, fostering robust knowledge sharing among developers.
details.8: Demonstrated proficiency in diverse testing methodologies, providing expert advice on Azure service purchases, employing encryption measures for data security, and ensuring comprehensive app accessibility.
details.9: Managed testing and automated application deployments using Azure Board pipelines, significantly enhancing software deployment efficiency and mitigating risks across the product lifecycle.

details.1: Collaborated closely with the manager on PHP and Symfony applications, fortifying a resilient system that ensured consistent client stability and satisfaction.
details.2: Helped to integrate innovative functionalities into company projects, leveraging React and Typescript to enhance user experiences and project capabilities significantly.
details.3: Fostered deeper client relationships and a comprehensive understanding of their needs, contributing to the continuous improvement of project outcomes.

details.1: Evaluated user-experience on Windows 11, creating Windows 11 Pro image using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit and optimising Active Directory Group Policy Objects.
details.2: Conducted hardware stress tests, performance benchmarking, and suitability testing for newly imaged machines, documenting changes.
details.3: Developed a time tracking software flow for precise client project hour billing.
details.4: Implemented Microsoft 365 tools like SharePoint Lists and Power Automate Flow for asset management, facilitating IT servicing tasks and enhancing asset identification for the helpdesk department.

details.1: Collaborated with the system administrator, using Linux for system maintenance.
details.2: Crafted a comprehensive report addressing the Apache log4j vulnerability, contributing significantly to raising awareness and preventing potential vulnerabilities.
details.3: Acquired in-depth knowledge regarding prevalent global cyber-attacks, fostering an enhanced understanding of threat landscapes.
details.4: Delivered a compelling presentation on common cyber-attacks targeting power sectors worldwide, actively supporting the team in fortifying DPDC's networks and services against potential threats.
